noun.description: In Portugal: a villa. In Brazil and other areas of Portuguese influence: a settlement, a village.

origin: Early 17th century. From Portuguese aldeia village (12th cent.; also † aldea; the sense villa, country house is apparently not paralleled in Portuguese before 1873) from Arabic al-ḍayʿa from al the + ḍayʿa landed estate, agricultural hamlet, farm, village.
